attributes.action: Should goverment stop giving our money away to other countries with our high tax

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament.

Alternatively you might be interested in signing the following petition calling on the Government to stop spending 0.7% of GNI on foreign aid: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/125692
